short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add blocklist feature for ppA Academy Website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Functionality:

- Filter users (a "Filter User" button appears when right-clicking on a user).
- A list of filtered users is displayed at the bottom, allowing for removal.
- Effective only on individual post pages. Not functional on group homepages.
- "Expand All Replies" button.

Version:
1.1.0:
- Support club homepage (applies to all threads)
- New option: reply are can be set to scrollable.

1.0.1:
- Fix initialization bugs.

1.0.0:
- Initial release.
